a.
int main(){
	int a = 2, b = 5;
	int r = potencia(a,b);
	return 0;
}

int multiplicacion(int a, int b){
	int i = 1, ac = 0;
	while(i<=b)
	{
		ac += a;
		i++;
	}
	return ac;
}

int potencia(int a, int b){
	int i = 1, ac = 1;
	while(i <= b){
		ac = multiplicacion(ac,a);
		i++;
	}
	return ac;
}


b.

mult	
0x0000	mov 1, %L0
0x0004	mov 0, %L1
While1	
0x0008	cmp %L0, %i1
0x000C	BG a, salida1
0x0010	add %L1, %i0, %L1
0x0014	Ba a, while1
0x0018	add %L0, %1, %L0
salida1	
0x001C	jmpl %O7,8,%g0
0x0020	mov %L1, %O0
potencia	
0x0024	mov 1, %L2
0x0028	mov 1, %L1
while2	
0x002C	cmp %L2, %i1
0x0030	BG a, salida2
0x0034	call mult
0x0038	mov %O0, %L1
0x003C	Ba   , while2
0x0040	add %L2, 1, %L2
salida2	
0x0044	jmpl %L4,8,%g0
0x0048	mov %l1, %O1
main	
0x004C	mov 2, %i0
0x0050	mov 5, %i1
0x0054	call potencia
0x0058	mov %O1, % L3
0x005C	mov 0, %O2

mult


10000000000101000010000000000001
10000000000101000110000000000000

While1
      
10000000101001000000000000011001
00110100100000000000000000000100
10100010000001000100000000000000 
00010000101111111111111111111101    
10100000000001000010000000000001

Exit1

10000001110000111110000000001000
10010000000100000000000000010001

Potencia

10000000000101001010000000000001
10000000000101000110000000000001

While2
      
10000000101001001010000000011001
00110100100000000000000000000100
01111111111111111111111111110011
10000000000100100000000000010001
00010000101111111111111111111011
10100000000001000010000000000001

Exit2

10000001110001010010000000001000
10010010000100000000000000010001

Main

10000000000101100010000000000010
10000000000101101010000000000101
01111111111111111111111111110100


10000000000100100100000000010011
10000000000100101010000000000000
